reviews.text: Lovely station and atmosphere. Clean and welcoming and great cafe and facilities as well. We'll worth a day out on the steam trains. Could not fault this as a day out. And you can take dogs on the train. 5 stars

Amazingly beautiful scenery along the journey! Breathtaking on a clear day. Very highly recommended and lovely to support the maintenance and running of such a wonderful, nostalgic way to travel! Will take a trip with the WHR almost every time we visit the area.

Although we had visited this beautiful area many times before, we had never been on the steam train journey between Portmadog and Blaenau Ffestiniog before. It's really beautiful, so much to see and if you miss certain features on the way you can catch them on the return journey. 😃

Okay so I chose the 2 hour trip but it certainly did not feel 2 hours due to the breathtaking views and the wonderful staff. Going there I ordered everything from there menu, had a lovely carrot cake with a cup of Welsh tea which is much better than your normal PG tips. The train felt so surreal and comfortable my daughter was running around having so much fun. On the way back I closed my eyes and fell asleep to the sound of the soothing train tracks. The feeling was just out of this world. Would definitely recommend it.
Find your inner geek and if you're older this brings back great memories of the steam age. Great food at the station. Caters for the young and older generation
